episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and intriguing facts, including a glowing sheep accidentally sold to an abattoir, a kangaroo stuck in a lift during the launch of BBC 2, a Dr. Seuss film that predicted the Manhattan Project, and the peculiar timing of Google searches for 'why is my poop green.'

facts.fact: Ruby, a sheep who'd been genetically engineered to glow in the dark, was accidentally sold to an abattoir.
During the launch of BBC 2 in 1964, a live kangaroo got stuck in a lift at television centre.
Dr. Seuss once wrote a Warner Brothers film that was banned because it accidentally predicted the Manhattan project.
The phrase 'why is my poop green' is Google's most commonly between 5 and 6 in the morning.
